psutils allows printing multiple pages per sheet:
  psnup -4 file.ps print.ps
  lpr print.ps
according to https://www.cade.utah.edu/faqs/how-can-i-print-multiple-pages-per-sheet-in-linux/ but tests were unsuccessful with `psnup -2 file.ps print.ps`. The pdfjam package is recommended instead.
(only recommended for Arch-based distros--see pdfjam for others) pdfnup allows printing multiple pages per sheet (default is 2):\n  pdfnup -o output.pdf input.pdf
